::Magmatron::

    The ship was ignoring him so he went with Plan B. He landed in the water 
and started up toward the underbelly of the ship. He took one of his big guns 
out and shot at it. He hoped it would do enough damage to take down the 
sheilds (it does have those right? If not then to weaken the hull). He 
started to collect energy from around him. He was going to try and blast 
throught the ship.
